Export.Routine:
; %ZLANGC00 ; custom commands for ObjectScript ; https://docs.intersystems.com/latest/csp/docbook/DocBook.UI.Page.cls?KEY=GSTU_customize#GSTU_customize_zlang Quit
ZPY(command) Public set:$namespace'="PYTHON" $namespace = "PYTHON" if ((command [ "=") || (command [ " ")) { set sc = ##class(isc.py.Main).SimpleString(command) } else { set sc = ##class(isc.py.Main).SimpleString(,command,,.result) write:sc result } write:'sc $System.Status.GetErrorText(sc) quit
